rounds.comments: (Alex: And finally, a variation on a popular category of ours: [*].)  (Bob: Oh boy!)  (Alex: This is like BEFORE & AFTER, but with an added element. For instance, a response might be, "toy soldier of fortune cookie". All right?  Leslie, I bet you're not going to start with that category, are you?)  (Leslie: And how right you are!)
